document.heading: District of Columbia Cooperative Housing Association Proportionate Voting Temporary Act of 1983

history.narrative: Law 5-57, the “District of Columbia Cooperative Housing Association Proportionate Voting Temporary Act of 1983,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 5-317. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on November 1, 1983, and November 15, 1983, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on November 21, 1983, it was assigned Act No. 5-85 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
